'''Diana Cortez''' is [[Colin Renfield|Colin Renfield's]] co-worker, who brought him to the hospital after his arm was traumatically amputated.

==History==
Diana and Colin were worked when Colin's arm was cut off by a conveyer belt. Diana brought Colin to the hospital, where she handed him off to the doctors before fainting. The doctors examined her and determined she'd had a vasovagal respond to the sight of Colin's blood. She told them that she'd seen the accident happening and it just kept playing over and over in her head. While talking about it, she fainted again, so they put her feet up.

Later, when she was taken to the ICU to see Colin, Diana said that she'd noticed something was wrong with the conveyer belt, but didn't tell anyone and wasn't paying attention when he turned it on. Diana stayed at the hospital until Colin's wife arrived and the two of them visited him together.

==Career==
She works at an e-tail fulfillment center.
